Name: Happy Penguin VR
About the game: 'Happy Penguin VR' is a casual VR game. In the game, all the items in the scene can be used, all items can be operated! Including a variety of need to unlock the fight props: Variety of penguins Various terrain A variety of special effects props A variety of combat props Shop trucks sell a variety of capacity props.
